items.sentence: Tom hasn't changed his clothes in three weeks.
I don't care what Tom does with his own money.
Why did you think Tom wasn't going to be here?
Do you think Tom would be able to repair this?
There were so many things I wanted to ask Tom.
I knew I wouldn't be able to keep up with Tom.
I knew you'd want to go to the dance with Tom.
If you knock three times, Tom will let you in.
Tom went fishing almost every day last summer.
A bank robbery took place here three days ago.
It took three weeks to demolish the old house.
I should come to Boston to visit you sometime.
We should do something like what Tom is doing.
Tom says he hasn't seen Mary for three months.
Tom eventually found out what the problem was.
I've never been in this part of Boston before.
According to Tom, Mary got married last month.
I started walking with a cane three years ago.
I like French, but I can't speak it very well.
I have only three hundred dollars in the bank.
Was Tom the one who taught you how to do that?
Was Tom the one who showed you how to do that?
Tom is the only one here who's been to Boston.
I wonder why Tom doesn't want to go to Boston.
Do you think Tom might not be able to do that?
Do you really think Tom would know what to do?
Did you really think Tom was going to do that?
Would you tell me why you want Tom to do that?
Would you like to know why Tom didn't do that?
Don't you want to see what Tom is going to do?
Don't you want to know why Tom didn't do that?
Does Tom know what he's going to do next year?
Do you think you can stop Tom from doing that?
Do you really believe Tom is going to do that?
Tom still hasn't done what we asked him to do.
It was stupid of you to believe what Tom said.
We haven't been able to get in touch with Tom.
It's going to be very lonely here without Tom.
That was the last time any of us ever saw Tom.
Do you have any idea what I should say to Tom?
Tom caught the ball and threw it back to Mary.
Tom pulled out a switchblade and stabbed Mary.
Tom sat in his rocking chair, reading a novel.
Why don't you go over to Tom's this afternoon?
When will they appoint someone to replace Tom?
Do you know where I might be able to find Tom?
I need you to tell me what you know about Tom.
I think it's time we found out more about Tom.
There was something not quite right about Tom.
Every woman in the room turned to look at Tom.
